segments.text: Is it your first time to join the sports meeting of Junior High School ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , and it's great . What are the events at the sports meeting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Long-distance race , dash , hurdle race , relay race , standing long jump , high jump , shotput and so on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our neighbor , Bruce , will take part in the relay race . Let's go have a look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The competition will begin in 5 minutes , it's tense here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wonderful , Bruce is taking the lead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Other competitors have almost caught up with him . They are neck and neck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , Bruce . Come on , Bruce .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , Bruce crossed the line first .
segments.speaker: S2
